title: Private Benjamin
writer: Nancy Meyers, Charles Shyer, Harvey Miller
actors: Goldie Hawn, Eileen Brennan, Armand Assante
plot: A sheltered young high-society woman joins the United States Army on a whim and finds herself in a trickier situation than she ever expected.
awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. 1 win & 6 nominations total
